summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5374 for the construction of a trunk sewer and subsewers to be known as the Ballard Trunk Sewer, along Market Street, from 28th Avenue Northwest to 24th Avenue Northwest, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, under Ordinance No. 65030, as amended by Ordinance No. 65338, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
